title: Jon Hamm to play Geena Davis' father in drama 'Marjorie Prime'
text:
Actress Geena Davis will be working with Jon Hamm on sci-fi drama Marjorie Prime, but what is interesting is that, this year's Emmy award winning actor will be playing her father in the project.
READ: â€‹Geena Davis: Would love to be part of 'Beetlejuice' sequel
The 59-year-old Thelma & Louise actress is excited to share the screen space with the 44-year-old Mad Men star, reported People magazine.
"Jon is actually playing my father! It is an interesting story that has a sci-fi element to it. I'm so excited to work with him and was so happy when he won the Emmy. He is such a good actor," Davis said.
Adaptation of last year's Pulitzer prize-nominated play by Jordan Harrison, the plot follows an ageing violinist named Marjorie, who, at age 85, finds that her memory is failing her.
Filmmaker Michael Almereyda will helm the project that also stars Tim Robbins.
